title: Collaborative Workshop for Workplace-Based Assessment and Feedback Literacy Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Enhancing mutual understanding between evaluators and evaluatees through joint workshops, establishing effective learning environments in resource-constrained settings. Includes structured activities considering power dynamics.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core principles and application methods of workplace-based assessment (WBA).
Learners understand the components of feedback literacy and apply them to real work situations.
Learners collaborate with peers in a shared workshop environment to improve assessment and feedback processes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
